properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Madhura madhuramu yesu naamam (2) Stutiki yogyamu prabhuni naamam (2) Madhura madhuramu yesu naamam Madhura mesuni naamam{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Swargamu veedi jagamuna karigi (2) Siluvalo rakhtamu chindinchen (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paapulaku vimochana mosagi Nerpuga thandritho naikyamu chesen{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rakhtamuche mammu shuddula jesen Devuni putrulugaa mammu maarchen{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aatmalo vaarasuluga mammu jesen Devuni mandiramuga nirminchen{/lang-eng}
